name: Janet Herb Active For Men
description:
Herb active fairness cream prevents skin darkening and leaves skin looking fairer. This triple sunscreen prevents skin darkening and works for UVA & UVB.
The Herbal Multivitamin 6x Fairness Power Protects & controls the formation of skin darkening cells in the skin. Ingredients are Aloe Vera, Mint, Lime, Turme.ric, Clove, Wheat Germ Oil, Carrot, Marigold, Arnica.*Images for illustration purpose only. Product received may vary.
